thread.title: President Trump’s Florida rally triggers the left – TheBlaze
thread.title_full: President Trump’s Florida rally triggers the left – TheBlaze

title: President Trump’s Florida rally triggers the left – TheBlaze
text:
Tweet 
During President Donald Trump’s rally in Florida, the president made critical comments about the press that angered many on the left. 
Dana Loesch gives an impassioned monologue acknowledging that calling the press “the enemy” was wrong, but goes into great lengths discussing the issues pertaining to the “legacy media” and how they were part and parcel of creating the current political climate. 
To see more from Dana, visit her channel on TheBlaze and watch full episodes of “Dana” live weekdays 6–7pm ET or anytime on-demand at TheBlaze TV . Rate this clip
